price: তেওঁৰ নিদৰ্শনাৱলীৰ মাজত আছে সাগৰত চলাচল কৰা পৰ্বতসদৃশ নৌযানসমূহ।
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلۡجَوَارِ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
